mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, sub.* FROM ( SELECT V.COMMENT_NO AS commentNo, V.CONTENT AS content, V.CREATE_DATE AS createDate, V.REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo, R.TITLE AS title, R.COUNT AS count FROM CP_RV_COMMENT V JOIN CP_REVIEW R ON V.REVIEW_NO = R.REVIEW_NO WHERE V.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND V.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY V.CREATE_DATE DESC ) sub WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) WHERE RN > #{startRow}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CP_RV_COMMENT
WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND IS_ACTIVE = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, sub_result.* FROM ( SELECT R.REPORT_NO reportNo, R.TITLE title, R.CREATE_DATE createDate, R.COUNT count, F.FILE_URL fileUrl FROM CP_REPORT R LEFT JOIN CP_RP_FILE F ON R.REPORT_NO = F.REPORT_NO
WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND R.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY R.CREATE_DATE DESC ) sub_result WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) WHERE RN > #{startRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CP_REPORT R LEFT JOIN CP_RP_FILE F ON R.REPORT_NO = F.REPORT_NO WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND R.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, sub_result.* FROM ( SELECT R.REVIEW_NO reviewNo, R.TITLE title, R.CREATE_DATE createDate, R.COUNT count FROM CP_REVIEW R
WHERE R.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY R.CREATE_DATE DESC ) sub_result WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) WHERE RN > #{startRow}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CP_REVIEW R
WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND IS_ACTIVE = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, sub_result.* FROM ( SELECT H.HISTORY_NO historyNo, H.REASON reason, H.POINT_CHANGE pointChange, H.CREATE_DATE createDate FROM CP_POINT_HISTORY H WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY H.CREATE_DATE DESC ) sub_result WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) WHERE RN > #{startRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CP_POINT_HISTORY WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT R.CAR_NO carNo, R.RENTAL_DATE rentalDate, R.RETURN_DATE returnDate, R.PAYMENT_COMPLETED_AT paymentCompletedAt, R.TOTAL_PRICE totalPrice, R.STATUS status, R.RESERVATION_ID reservationId, C.MODEL_NO modelNo, D.CAR_MODEL carModel, I.PARKING_ID parkingId, I.PARKING_TITLE title, I.PARKING_ADDR parkingAddr, C.CAR_ID carId FROM CP_RENTAL_RESERVATION R JOIN CP_RENTAL_CAR C ON R.CAR_NO = C.CAR_NO JOIN CP_RENTAL_CAR_MODEL D ON C.MODEL_NO = D.MODEL_NO JOIN CP_PARKING_INFO I ON C.PARKING_ID = I.PARKING_ID
WHERE R.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND R.RETURN_DATE < SYSDATE ORDER BY RENTAL_DATE DESC
